name: Rogue (itch) (NicoD)
description:
Arrow keys to move. Find the exit.

This is a prototype for a roguelike. 

The art is a free asset pack done by 0x72.

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

The music is also a free asset pack.

https://rtxgaming.itch.io/premium-rpg-music-pack-dungeon-crawler

Please tell me if you find bugs in the level generation or in the AI.
